archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1459
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to be able to motivate and reward customers for the frequency with which they engage with Vodafone Rewards

properties.value: [CLM] CLM enables promotion designer as an advanced engine to create business rules, issue points, offers, rewards to customers based on choosen conditions as behaviour, sales, loyalty activity, OOTB what are the rules?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
